review: Works great so far, a bit slower loading than the Roku 3 box as expected but quality is just as good.

review: 2000 channels.Cut the cord and kill the dish already. I have three of these, and I'm saving $90 a month from DirecTV used to charge me.$35 uhf roof antenna drags  35 channels in HD for free for locals

review: Besides the feature that allows you to find where to buy the cheapest movie, I like the fire TV much better!

review: Great product! Arrived on to line and easy setup.

review: Bought this to test it out and it's great. I don't use it but my 5 year old loves it. It is perfect for a kids tv

review: So small and easy to use.Roku streams incredibly fast and works pretty flawlessly.Had absolutely no problem w/ my refurb.I do wish I could program those new buttons though, blockbuster.. really?
